Kevin Dockery | Whitesboro, Texas

Kevin Dockery
=============

Position

Phone Number

903-564-3585

903-564-6254

[Email](https://www.whitesboro.org/email-contact/node/2431/field_email "Email Kevin  Dockery (opens in a new window)")

Lieutenant Dockery attended the Texoma Police Academy and graduated in 2007. After graduation, he came to work for the Whitesboro Police Department and has been with the department for 12 years. He was promoted to Sargent in 2017 and in 2018, he advanced to Lieutenant. Lt. Dockery is married and has two boys. He holds an advanced peace officer and field training officer (FTO) certificate, among others. One of the things he loves most about his career is the ability to help people on a daily basis. He enjoys hanging out with his wife and sons and outdoor activities on his days off.

[Print](https://www.whitesboro.org/print/pdf/node/2431)
